{{flavour|An armour made for centaurs, to wear over their equine half.}}

'''Centaur [[barding]]s''' are a type of armor intended for [[centaur]]s to wear in place of [[boots]], which do not fit on their horse-shaped lower halves. Although significantly less common than boots, they provide double the AC and can be enchanted twice as heavily. In exchange, they do have a slight [[encumbrance rating]], but this has no effect on your spellcasting, [[stealth]], or accuracy. The only negative impact is a loss of 2 points to your [[ev]]asion, which can not be reduced by a high armor skill. 

Possible egos include:
*[[Fire resistance]]
*[[Cold resistance]]
*[[Flying]]
*[[Stealth]]

AC from centaur barding is not penalized by a centaur's [[Bad mutations#Deformed Body|oddly-shaped body]]. Non-centaurs cannot wear centaur barding, though [[naga]]s have [[naga barding]], a type of barding intended for them.

==History==
*In [[0.26]], [[centaur barding]]s and [[naga barding]]s were merged into a single item type called [[barding]]s.
*In [[0.12]], bardings of levitation were replaced with bardings of flying.
